ygData.subject: Re: Staff of Observe/FBR/ROO
ygData.msgSnippet: ooo staff of writhing? Thats a staff which proud elves like us should wield =) btw, oracle is solo but i think quite high level and no no to Observer staff. If
ygData.messageBody:
ooo staff of writhing? Thats a staff which proud elves like us should wield =) btw, oracle is solo but i think quite high level and no no to Observer staff. If garren tanks and the lady charms him.... I also heard the eyeball hits quite hard so we do him later..
As for Najena, she spawns about once every hour, but FBR is 100% load. The JM boots have 1 charge but from what i heard its bugged so can use and reuse. It also doesn't let you run as fast as sow, only twice the current speed. So once we got more ppl above level 25, we go for najena =)
Need the FBR soon, see all those casters all wear FBR, and I still using the white robe quite no face... hehe

Leshrec High Elven Wizard of the Seventh Circle.

-----Original Message-----
From: Sereph <garford@...>
To: sg-everquest@onelist.com <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, July 27, 1999 5:25 PM
Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Staff of Observe/FBR/ROO


Miss eyeball can CHARM. Damn dangerous unless can cast resist magic and have a high charisma or you guys get me a mistmoore drum (add 25% to all drum base song effects, all my magic resistance song is drumb base BTW.)
The Oracle is hard to kill, I got my robe by doing his quest to find the tome (The tomb is broken up into 7 pieces. Can only remember the location of the one in Neriak)

Talking about killing lvl 30+ mobs, any one willing to kill the Kobold nobel in Nagera's lair? That's where a certain skull staff is spawnded in.

Sereph, drawing blue prints to Guk trip and thinking up Najera's one.

LKW wrote:

From: LKW <leekw13@...>
Err, the journey man boot good meh? I know it has sow kinda effect but got
charges right? Can it be rechargable? If not quite useless leh. Actually
I'm more concern abt the FBR. With a status like us, we shld wear at least
a FBR, hehe.

Is the lvl 30+ mob from OOT got many kakis or it's a solo mob? High lvl 30
or low lvl 30?

Didn't know eye of zomm got such use! Does it work for all kinda lock
door? I seldom use it, but can we cancel the eye anytime b4 it disappear
by left-clicking the icon (like other spell effects)?

I'm thinking, if the lens is from a lvl 35 mob, we can get Garren,
Leshrec, me, yiyang and 2 more lvl 20s (hairy man and Aqua gu niang?), I
think we can take it. Only problem I worry is the mob's kakis...;(

Ziltus

On Monday, 26 July, 1999 4:48 PM, Leshrec [SMTP:leshrec@...]
wrote:
> From: "Leshrec" <leshrec@...>
>
> About the Najena thing, once we have enough local players hitting 25, we
can
> go hunt down the mob with the Journey man boots liao. She conned black to
me
> for four spawns and her 2 side kick necros con blue to me and I was 25.
> However that place is VERY camped, but I noticed that from 4-7pm, that
place
> quite empty. So I'm sure most ppl want boots cept those can SoW
themselves,
> therefore I suggest a Najena trip soon. (maybe can even get a few FBRs
and
> whips =)
> btw, no need keys to open door, eye of zomm works just as well. Just have
to
> summon eye, then use the eyeball and push the door to open. Works for
locked
> doors as well. About the Staff, the eyeball is level 35 (Info from
sereph)
> and the oracle robe is also from a level 30+ mob in OOT.
>
> Leshrec High Elven Wizard of the Seventh Circle.
